messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm BACKKKKK!!!
messages.msgSnippet: strange. i never missed a single post. i d say the www still has some glitches to work through. oh well, glad you re back. amy ... From: Pris
messages.messageBody:
strange. i never missed a single post. i'd say the www still has some
glitches to work through. oh well, glad you're back.
amy
----- Original Message -----
From: Pris <x_t_sipr@...>
To: Unschooling-dotcom <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 4:14 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm BACKKKKK!!!


> HIIIiiiiiiiiii everybody :)
>
> well, didga miss me??? I've been stuck out in CYBERSPACE ALL ALONE!!!
hehe
> ... I just received the following message from eGroups and I guess I don't
> have STINKY FEET AFTER ALL!!! it seems they've had some technical probs
> the past day/so and I'm SO RELIEVED it's NOT ME!!! hehe ...
>
> wow, this is WEIRD, I just received 1,000 + messages (yes, I'm
exaggerating)
> and several of which I posted LAST NIGHT!!! goodness ...
>
> soooooo, whatever ... I'll be back after I catch up on reading all of your
> interesting posts <G>
>
> Pris ~> who'z glad to be HOME AGAIN :P
>
> ~*~*~*~*~*~
>
> Hi,
>
> We apologize for the inconvenience, eGroups had technical difficulties
with
> mail delivery last nigh. Mail was not delivered for approximately 12
hours.
> The problem has been resolved, and the backlogged mail will be delivered
to
> the groups as soon as possible. Once again we apologize for the
> inconvenience.
>
> % %
>
>
